Class TestCommandMap

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.io.CommandMap
      net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.io.TestCommandMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
ButtonListener
public class TestCommandMap
extends CommandMap

The default mapping of virtual keys to commands. This is a test map, basically, and command maps probably need to be swapped in and out depending on context.
